summary: This mod simply changes the emission colour of Khajiit eyes, faking a \"glow\" effect.
descriptionHtml:
I originally wanted to improve the default normal maps for eyes and enable glow maps, but I quickly realised I wasn\'t ready to experiment with the new shader system. So I changed the default emission colour instead, applying a fake glow effect to Khajiit eyes. They don\'t actually glow but it looks nice anyway. :P

Replaces male and female Khajiit eyeball mesh. Put in your 

\\Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\character assets directory. 
To remove, simply delete the files. 

Credits: NifSkope. I love NifSkope.
author: Borearis
